channel.title: In need of help with NPC and shops
channel.description: please please please please help me, i need a guide that noobs can understand.. lmao.. i made the shop, but i just cant make it so that when you click "trade" with the NPC, it wont DisConnect you, it will bring up the shop.

please please please please help me, i need a guide that noobs can understand… lmao… i made the shop, but i just cant make it so that when you click “trade” with the NPC, it wont DisConnect you, it will bring up the shop.
